report.name: Datasets With Missing Info
report.data: SELECT DS.Dataset_ID As Dataset_ID, DS.Dataset_Num AS Dataset, DS.DS_created AS Created, InstName.IN_name AS Instrument, RR.ID AS RequestedRun_ID, DS.DS_LC_column_ID AS LC_Column_ID, DS.DS_type_ID AS Dataset_Type_ID, DS.DS_sec_sep AS Secondary_Sep, CASE WHEN RR.ID IS NULL THEN 'Dataset does not have a requested run; create one' WHEN DS.DS_LC_column_ID IS NULL THEN 'LC Column ID is null' WHEN DS.DS_type_ID IS NULL THEN 'Dataset Type ID is null' WHEN DS.DS_sec_sep IS NULL THEN 'Secondary_Sep is null' ELSE 'Unknown Error' END AS [Warning] FROM T_Dataset DS LEFT OUTER JOIN T_Instrument_Name InstName ON DS.DS_instrument_name_ID = InstName.Instrument_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN T_Requested_Run RR ON DS.Dataset_ID = RR.DatasetID WHERE DS.DS_created >= '1/1/2015' AND (RR.ID IS NULL OR DS.DS_instrument_name_ID IS NULL OR DS.DS_LC_column_ID IS NULL OR DS.DS_type_ID IS NULL OR DS.DS_sec_sep IS NULL)

report.name: DMS Production DB Errors
report.data: SELECT Dataset_ID, Dataset_Num, DS_comment, DS_state_ID, DS_created FROM T_Dataset WHERE (DS_comment LIKE '%exception%' OR DS_comment LIKE '%not ready%' OR DS_comment LIKE '%Invalid dataset.%' OR DS_comment LIKE '%Dataset not ready%' OR DS_comment LIKE '%Sharing violation while copying%' OR DS_comment LIKE '%NeedToAbortProcessing%' OR DS_comment LIKE '%Error running OpenChrom%') AND (DS_created >= DATEADD(month, -1, GETDATE())) AND (DS_state_ID = 3) ORDER BY DS_comment

report.name: Disabled Indices on Gigasax
report.data: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'DMS5' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS5.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Capture' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Capture.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Pipeline' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Pipeline.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Data_Package' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Data_Package.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'Ontology_Lookup' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM Ontology_Lookup.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 ) LookupQ WHERE Disabled_Indices > 0

report.name: Disabled Indices on ProteinSeqs
report.data: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'MT_Main' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM MT_Main.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'Manager_Control' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM Manager_Control.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'Protein_Sequences' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM Protein_Sequences.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'PT_Human_sp_A335' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM PT_Human_sp_A335.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'MT_Human_PVN_Q_P1299' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM MT_Human_PVN_Q_P1299.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 ) LookupQ WHERE Disabled_Indices > 0
